title: Support main lf team/clash team
body:
Hey all! I'm a support main with a large champion pool. Currently a S2 but was previously gold in past seasons. I feel that I play at a higher level than S2 (but don't we all). I'm looking for a team or clash team for this weekend.  My mains are Alistar, Janna, Thresh, Leona, Rakan, Morg, Braum and Lulu. If you need a support, at least let me try out before you deny me because of my rank. I would be willing to play a couple normals so you all can see what I can do as a support.  IGN is Kaossi

Thanks all, looking forward to playing on a team!

replies.body: Hi, I am an ADC main and have a Mid main friend looking for team. Both of us are Silver 2. Send jumanjiji an add if you're keen to join us! Will still need a jungle and top. I'll accept friend request after work if you're keen :)
Friend used to be plat 5 and I used to be Gold 1 however we took a break from league, so if you're a good support I'd love to have you in my lane ;)
